title: I\'ve noticed that recently (in downtown Wilmington), there appear to be cameras housed in large black boxes at almost every intersection off of both Front St. and 2nd St. (Front & Market, Dock and Front, Dock and 2nd...). Am I mistaken or have they actually put up cameras to keep an eye on downtown?
text:
You're not being paranoid. There are cameras all over downtown --
and in other parts of the city.



Here are some links to previous answers:
